name: A Clockwise Compulsion
description:
A submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019, with the theme 'only one'.

Arrows to move, X to spin, space to shoot (once you can). Do a full rotation to reload

I had fun making it, but I feel it should've been shorter, but thicker. If you know what I mean.

Inspired by my childhood nightmares and bizarre compulsions. I had a habit that every time I turned in one direction, I had to spin in the other direction to balance it out.
